description: This is a shell script used to manage the lifecycle of the UPnP InternetGatewayDevice (IGD) daemon on a device. It includes functions to start, stop, and synchronize the IGD service, handle IPv4 status changes, and perform resynchronization processes.

methods.name: resync_upnp
methods.description: Performs resynchronization of UPNP settings and manages IGD processes for current network interfaces.

methods.name: check_IGD_is_up
methods.description: Waits for the IGD process to initialize, attempting multiple times until successful.

methods.name: handle_ipv4_status
methods.description: Handles the IPv4 status change for a given network interface, starting or killing the IGD process as needed.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Starts the IGD service if enabled.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stops the IGD service and cleans up related files.

methods.name: init_once
methods.description: Performs initial setup for the IGD service, ensuring necessary directories exist.

methods.name: service_init
methods.description: Initializes the service, calling setup functions.
